comment.name: Sample_description
comment.value: Before sowing, seeds were placed at 4°C for 3 days Arabidopsis seedlings were grown in growth chambers at 22°C supplied with continuous light. Before sowing, seeds were placed at 4°C for 3 days for stratification. Individual seeds were planted on pre-wetted pots of 2 sq inches containing a mixture of 3:1 compost and sand previously treated with the insecticide Intercept. Pots were placed in trays and covered with propagators, which were removed 8 days after seed germination. Seedlings were watered regularly until the tissue was collected for RNA extraction. Growth chamber Commercial soil 65 21
